subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Four of the N.B.A.’s eight underdogs won their playoff openers over the weekend, none of them more shocking than the Bulls’ 105-103 defeat of the defending champion Celtics.
snippet: Four of the N.B.A.’s eight underdogs won their playoff openers over the weekend, none of them more shocking than the Bulls’ 105-103 defeat of the defending champion Celtics.
